_changelog.2025-02-09: Added 'elections-2021' source for IEC municipal election results (represents 2022 governing parties)

elections-2021._description: 2021 IEC Municipal Election Results (used as 2022 governing party data). Downloaded via ElectionsSourceDownloader.DownloadAndConsolidateAsync()
elections-2021._notes: The IEC election portal requires province-by-province selection. ElectionsSourceDownloader automates multi-province download and consolidation.
